hero.title: Building SaaS-like platforms, booking systems, and admin dashboards
hero.description: Riyadh-based developer specializing in Next.js, Supabase, and Tailwind CSS. I help businesses turn ideas into scalable web applications.

about.title: Quick Intro
about.text: I create booking platforms, B2B marketing systems, and admin dashboards with integrated payment gateways (PayTabs, Geidea, Moyasar).
